title: Egg & Onion Scramble
instructions: Beat eggs, chop onions, fry onions, add eggs, scramble. Serve.

title: Onion Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with salt. Sauté onions in butter. Pour eggs, cook till done.

title: Garlic Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta. Cook garlic and tomatoes, toss with pasta.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Fry onions and garlic, add chicken and spices, cook until tender.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Cook onions and tomatoes in butter, add spices and paneer cubes, simmer in cream.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice
instructions: Fry veggies, mix cooked rice, add soy sauce and seasoning.

title: Masala Dosa
instructions: Spread dosa batter, fill with spiced potato filling, cook till crispy.

title: Idli Sambhar
instructions: Prepare idlis, make sambhar using dal and veggies, serve hot.

title: Poha
instructions: Fry mustard seeds and onions, add soaked poha, mix with turmeric and peanuts.

title: Aloo Paratha
instructions: Stuff spiced mashed potatoes into dough, roll and cook with butter.

title: Chole Bhature
instructions: Cook chickpeas in spicy gravy, serve with deep-fried bhature.

title: Vegetable Pulao
instructions: Cook rice with vegetables and whole spices.

title: Fish Fry
instructions: Marinate fish with spices, shallow fry until crispy.

title: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Cook marinated chicken with half-cooked rice and spices, layer and steam.

title: Mutton Curry
instructions: Cook mutton pieces with onion-tomato gravy until tender.

title: Dal Tadka
instructions: Cook dal, temper with ghee, garlic, and spices.

title: Palak Paneer
instructions: Blend boiled spinach, cook with paneer and mild spices.

title: Rajma Chawal
instructions: Cook soaked rajma with onion-tomato gravy and serve with rice.

title: Butter Chicken
instructions: Cook chicken in tomato gravy with butter and cream.

title: Veg Sandwich
instructions: Layer vegetables between buttered bread slices and toast.

title: Pav Bhaji
instructions: Mash boiled veggies with spices, serve with butter-toasted pav.

title: Samosa
instructions: Stuff spiced potato filling in dough and deep fry.

title: Paneer Tikka
instructions: Marinate paneer with yogurt and spices, grill until golden.

title: Vada Pav
instructions: Fry spiced potato vada and serve in bun with chutney.

title: Dhokla
instructions: Ferment batter, steam, and temper with mustard seeds.

title: Upma
instructions: Roast rava, cook with sautéed onions and spices.

title: Rava Kesari
instructions: Roast rava in ghee, cook with sugar syrup and flavor with cardamom.

title: Poori Masala
instructions: Fry poori, serve with mildly spiced potato curry.

title: Pesarattu
instructions: Grind soaked moong dal, spread as dosa, cook with onions.

title: Pongal
instructions: Cook rice and dal together, temper with ghee and pepper.

title: Curd Rice
instructions: Mix cooked rice with curd, temper with spices.

title: Lemon Rice
instructions: Mix cooked rice with lemon juice and tempered spices.

title: Tomato Soup
instructions: Blend boiled tomatoes, cook with garlic and seasonings.

title: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Boil chopped vegetables, season with salt and pepper.

title: Chicken Soup
instructions: Boil chicken with spices and serve hot.

title: Rasam
instructions: Boil tamarind water with spices and tomatoes.

title: Kadhi Pakora
instructions: Cook gram flour fritters and simmer in yogurt gravy.

title: Jeera Rice
instructions: Fry cumin in ghee, mix with cooked rice.

title: Aloo Gobi
instructions: Cook potatoes and cauliflower with onion and spices.

title: Bhindi Masala
instructions: Fry okra, cook with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

title: Vegetable Cutlet
instructions: Mash boiled veggies, coat with bread crumbs, shallow fry.

title: Egg Curry
instructions: Boil eggs, cook in onion-tomato gravy with spices.

title: Kadai Paneer
instructions: Cook paneer cubes with onions, tomatoes, and kadai masala.

title: Veg Burger
instructions: Assemble toasted buns with patty, cheese, and veggies.

title: Chicken Sandwich
instructions: Mix shredded chicken with mayo, spread on bread and serve.

title: Paneer Roll
instructions: Wrap spiced paneer and veggies in tortilla and toast.

title: Mushroom Masala
instructions: Cook mushrooms in onion-tomato masala.

title: Chili Chicken
instructions: Stir-fry marinated chicken with vegetables and sauce.

title: Vegetable Noodles
instructions: Stir-fry boiled noodles with vegetables and sauce.

title: Paneer Fried Rice
instructions: Fry paneer cubes, mix with rice and vegetables in soy sauce.
